name: Shape Laner (Open Beta)
description:
WELCOME TO SHAPE LANER!

Controls:
--------------

Desktop: Arrow Keys (left and right)

Mobile: Swipe (left and right)

Credits:
--------------

Concept Art: Bianca Rühr-Levy
Technical Art: David Mülhausen
Game Design & Programming: David Vath
Production, Sound Design & Music: Janik Rennollet

BETA DISCLAIMER:

Please note that you are accessing the Beta Version of Shape Laner which is in the process of being tested before its official release. The sole purpose of this Beta Version is to conduct testing and obtain feedback.
